task_summary: Grasp the dishwasher handle and pull to open the hinged door, then retreat safely.

task_long_description.overview: A mobile manipulator approaches a stainless dishwasher embedded between a fridge and a wooden cabinet. The task is to pull open the dishwasher door by grasping its bar handle. The robot first perceives and verifies the handle, aligns the end-effector, closes the gripper to secure the grasp, actuates an opening motion on the hinged door, and finally retreats to clear the workspace. Visual frames show progressive approach and interaction with the handle; parameters favor moderate force, precise alignment, and bounded timeouts.
preconditions: Handle is reachable from the robot's workspace
stepwise_plan: Scan and confirm visibility of the dishwasher handle
Approach and align to the handle with tight tolerance
Close gripper and verify grasp stability
Command container opening for the hinged dishwasher door
Retreat to a safe distance and briefly wait
success_criteria: Door angle increases from closed state and remains open
Handle grasp remains stable during opening
Robot retreats to a safe pose
failure_and_recovery: Handle not detected → rescan and re-approach
Misalignment → repeat alignment with same tolerance
Grasp slip → reopen, realign, and regrip
Door jam → abort open and signal operator
task_long_description.termination: When the door is confirmed opened and the robot has retreated and waited briefly.

frame_3.now_evidence: end-effector appears seated on the handle indicating first secure contact

node_specs.description: Prepare to grasp by opening gripper to handle width.
Active search for the handle in the scene.
Confirm visual lock on handle before approach.
Move and align end-effector to grasp pose.
Secure the handle with moderate force.
Verify that the grasp is stable before actuation.
Command opening of the dishwasher's hinged door.
Back away to clear the opened door.
Short dwell to allow settling and human verification.

recovery_strategy: Repeat scan with same raster pattern
Reopen and regrip with same force
Abort and notify if door cannot open
assumptions: Frames show a standard stainless dishwasher with a bar handle; opening behaves as a hinged door dropping forward. No explicit retries requested; using moderate force and standard timeouts.

expected_success_criteria: Door visibly moves from closed to open
